#summary エミュレータに関する情報
== 起動方法 ==
 + https://ddd-wms.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ddd-wms-emulator をチェックアウト
 + mvn jetty:run
 + http://localhost:8080/emulator/ に Google Chrome でアクセス

== 通信フォーマット ==
=== 入荷依頼 ===
 * URL
 ${baseUrl}/arrivalRequest/

 * POST
{{{
{
  date: 2010-05-10,
  items: [
    { id: 1, amount: 5 },
    { id: 2, amount: 1 }
  ]
}
}}}

 * Responce
{{{
{
  id: 111
}
}}}

=== 入荷 ===
 * URL
 ${baseUrl}/arrival/

 * POST
{{{
{
  id: 111
}
}}}

 * Responce

=== 出荷指示 ===
 * URL
 ${baseUrl}/shippingRequest/

 * POST
{{{
{
  date: 2010-05-10,
  items: [
    { id: 1, amount: 5 },
    { id: 2, amount: 1 }
  ]
}
}}}

 * Responce
